title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for ∫ − 1 0 ( 1 − 2 sin x ) d x   a n d   ∫ 0 1 e − 4 x d x             

2 point is earned for antiderivatives

1 point is earned for answer

∫ − 1 1 f ( x ) d x   =   ∫ − 1 0 f ( x ) d x   + ∫ 0 1 f ( x ) d x                                   = ∫ − 1 0 ( 1 − 2 sin x ) d x + ∫ 0 1 e − 4 x d x                                     = [ x + 2 cos x ] x = − 1 x = 0 + [ − 1 4 e − 4 x ] x = 0 x = 1                             = ( 3 − 2 cos ( − 1 ) ) + ( − 1 4 e − 4 + 1 4 ) A v e r a g e   v a l u e   = 1 2 ∫ − 1 1 f ( x ) d x                                             = 13 8 − cos ( − 1 ) − 1 8 e − 4
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for ∫ − 1 0 ( 1 − 2 sin x ) d x   a n d   ∫ 0 1 e − 4 x d x              

2 point is earned for antiderivatives

1 point is earned for answer

∫ − 1 1 f ( x ) d x   =   ∫ − 1 0 f ( x ) d x   + ∫ 0 1 f ( x ) d x                                   = ∫ − 1 0 ( 1 − 2 sin x ) d x + ∫ 0 1 e − 4 x d x                                     = [ x + 2 cos x ] x = − 1 x = 0 + [ − 1 4 e − 4 x ] x = 0 x = 1                             = ( 3 − 2 cos ( − 1 ) ) + ( − 1 4 e − 4 + 1 4 ) A v e r a g e   v a l u e   = 1 2 ∫ − 1 1 f ( x ) d x                                             = 13 8 − cos ( − 1 ) − 1 8 e − 4

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for ∫ − 1 0 ( 1 − 2 sin x ) d x   a n d   ∫ 0 1 e − 4 x d x             

2 point is earned for antiderivatives

1 point is earned for answer

∫ − 1 1 f ( x ) d x   =   ∫ − 1 0 f ( x ) d x   + ∫ 0 1 f ( x ) d x                                   = ∫ − 1 0 ( 1 − 2 sin x ) d x + ∫ 0 1 e − 4 x d x                                     = [ x + 2 cos x ] x = − 1 x = 0 + [ − 1 4 e − 4 x ] x = 0 x = 1                             = ( 3 − 2 cos ( − 1 ) ) + ( − 1 4 e − 4 + 1 4 ) A v e r a g e   v a l u e   = 1 2 ∫ − 1 1 f ( x ) d x                                             = 13 8 − cos ( − 1 ) − 1 8 e − 4
